name: Lime & Lemon Drizzle Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120g unsalted butter, 70g for cake, 50g for icing
120g caster sugar, 70g for cake, 50g for drizzle
1 medium lime, keep the juice and the zest
1 medium lemon, keep the juice and the zest

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 70g of butter with 70g of caster sugar in a mixing bowl.
Add the vanilla extract, baking powder and egg.
Incrementally add the flour until combined fully.
Lightly butter a muffin tin for 6 and equally share the dough into each and bake for 25 minutes.
In a pan on a medium heat, melt 50g of caster sugar with the juice and zest of a lemon until the sugar melts and the drizzle thickens and then set to one side.
Combine the icing sugar with 50g of butter and the zest of the lime and 1sp of the juice and then place the mixture into a piping bag.
Once the muffins are cooked, allow to cool fully before piping the icing on top and then top with the lemon drizzle.
